title: Jungling as rengar
body: I want to know whether I should sell my jungling item late game. I usually get trailblazer with warrior{{item:3723}} and was wondering what to do? Also, any other tips would be appreciated as I am new to jungling.

replies.body:
Most often times I just rush brutalizer, and into tiamat and mobi boots. I just sit on machete for a while, and build stalker's blade or skirmisher's sabre, and build the brutalizer into warriors.

That way, you get your power spike a lot earlier so you're a bigger threat to the enemy jungler, as you can easily catch him in his own jungle and kill him or get an easy counter gank off  because you technically have an item or two above him. e.g you have brutalizer and enemy jg has stalker's

You won't need ranger's trailblazer once you have tiamat, so I would build tiamat after brutalizer or mobi boots, then into either stalker's blade or skirmisher's sabre.

It is worth keeping a red or blue smite, if you build trailblazer, hold off buying an enchantment till you are far enough developed to not need the healing from trailblazer, then you buy either blue or red smite (for 255) then the warrior enchantment, although I advise to try get warrior enchantment as soon as you can, because it is quite a huge power spike on rengar early, giving cdr armor pen and decent damage (especially with the damage boost its getting(reverted to before its nerf to compete with devourer, which is getting a nerf)
